headline.main: CAMERA MEN'S JOB IN WAR IS PRAISED; ' Photographers Are Doing a Great Service,' Is Tribute of Major Gen. Jarman

lead_paragraph: A tribute to the work of news photographers on the war and home fronts was paid last night by Major Gen. Sanderford Jarman, commanding general of the Antiaircraft Artillery Command of the Eastern Defense Command, at the opening of the eighth annual exhibition of the Press Photographers Association of New York, Inc., at the New York Museum of Science and Industry, Rockefeller Center.
abstract: Wins 4 Press Photographers exhibit prizes; gets awards; illus
